UserAuth.buttonForm: {type, select, login {Log In} register {Sign Up} other {#}}
UserAuth.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid university email address.
UserAuth.invalidUniversityEmail: Please enter a valid university email address.
UserAuth.toastSignInSuccessDescription: We sent you a login link. Be sure to check your spam too.
UserAuth.yourGithub: in your Github to sign in.
UserAuth.githubErrorDescription: To sign in with GitHub, your university email must be the primary email in your GitHub account. Please follow these steps:
UserAuth.step1: Go to your GitHub account and navigate to the settings.
UserAuth.step2: Go to 'Access, Emails' and set your university email as your primary email.
UserAuth.step3: Make sure that on the same 'Access, Emails' page, the 'Keep my email addresses private' option is unchecked.
UserAuth.step4: Go to 'Public profile' and select your university email as the public email.

ChatEmptyScreen.welcome: How can I help you today?
ChatEmptyScreen.description: You can start a conversation here or try the following examples:
ChatEmptyScreen.message-1: Can you help me solve this math problem?
ChatEmptyScreen.message-2: I have a Python test tomorrow. Can you give me some questions to practice?
ChatEmptyScreen.message-3: Can you check my essay for grammar and spelling errors?
